title: League is Freezing
body: Why is league freezing in champ select?? And on top of that everyone is forced to leave the lobby and gets ban timers!

replies.body: I'm starting to see more and more reports of players getting stuck in champ select. After you get out of that lobby, check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick and try running our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) as well. Grab a screenshot of the log reader if you can and post it here so I can look over it.
